mapper.select: SELECT T.*, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.CO_CD) AS CO_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.WH_CD) AS WH_NM, (SELECT PRDT_NM FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.OWNER_CD) AS OWNER_NM, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_CD = T.CLNT_CD) AS CLNT_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.TYP_CD) AS TYP_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.MAKR_CD) AS MAKR_NM, (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE PRJCT_CD = T.PRJCT_CD) AS PRJCT_NM, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.ACINS_ID) AS ACINS_NM FROM TB_SM03M01 T WHERE 1=1 AND CO_CD = #{coCd} AND ACINS_DT = #{acinsDt} AND STOK_SEQ = #{stokSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_SM03M01 WHERE ACINS_DT = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{acinsDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYYMMDD')
